title: Explorers of the Deep December 17th
description:
Explorers of the Deep consists of three activities that can be done all at once or individually, making it highly adaptable for classrooms, afterschool programs, clubs and more:

Ocean Robot Test Tank is an activity where youth learn how to “ballast” their ocean robot by adding weights to replicate the sinking and floating behavior of a real ocean robot. They will investigate data collected by ocean robots and learn about the value of ocean exploration.

Ocean Expedition is a board game where youth navigate their ocean robot around the world while learning key ocean concepts. Topics include aquaculture, climate change, innovation, human impact and the ocean ecosystem.

Ocean Communicator is an activity in which young people investigate challenges that ocean scientists, engineers and technologists are currently exploring. They design and advocate for innovations and technical solutions that inspire public action.

description:

title: Launching the 2021 Season
description: Even though the 2020 season is behind us, it is time to start thinking about 2021.  Virtual operations have taken a huge step forward since the start of COVID.  FIRST has provided a set of resources for use in virtual settings to keep skills sharpened.  Check them out from the FIRST Inspires

title: FIRST Update for May 2020
description:
Today, FIRST announced an update to the 2021 season with welcome news about the future of the program. You can find the detailed update here. While there are a lot of details regarding funds and how that will be handled by the FIRST offices, I want to draw your attention to the acknowledgement of the abrupt season ending on our youth. Drawing from the announcement, 'FIRST has determined that the 2020 INFINITE RECHARGE game will be replayed for the 2021 FIRST® GAME CHANGERS, powered by Star Wars: Force for Change season. Over the next few months the Game Design Team will be looking at adjustments to the game, all of which you will learn about at Kickoff in 2021.'

I know that I am super excited to see this come from the program and will give our youth the chance to finish what they started. Also, I noticed that the new First@Home subsite offers valuable resources that the Program will investigate and look into. You can find out more about it here.

As we look to the future, more virtual content is being incorporated into the program. A new weekly learning plan is being released that promises new ways of engaging and using Technology like we know it can be used!

Take Care and stay safe!
Kenny

title: Final Testing!
description:
It is down to crunch time for the Botsmiths! Full system testing is underway and all those assumptions about how the robot would perform is now being tested. Good luck to Team 4309 Botsmiths as they compete this coming weekend at Glacier Peak High School. If you are interested in seeing the competition, stop in 29 February or 1 March.
This year's Bot has all the makings of World Class play!

title: Infinite Recharge Launches 2020!
description: The FRC 2020 Season has launched with this year's video preview.  Check it out!

description: Team 4309 Botsmiths is hard at work creating this year's robot for Deep Space sponsored by Boeing.
